# StarFunctions Usage and description
This package includes a dataset along with a method to calculate the distance to a star (in Parsecs) 

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```


## Setup and loading data
The following is how to install the package along with including the dataset

```{r setup}
# Include the Library
library(starFunctions)

# Import the dataset
data("starData")
```


## Method
#### Star Distance [starDist()]
**NOTE this method is only for main sequence stars**

```{r}
# Using starDist() 
test1 <- starDist(0.0005, 16.6)
test1

# Using starDist() with the dataset
test2 <- starDist(starData$Luminosity[1],starData$Absolute.Magnitude[1])
test2
```
